Title: Fraktus - Das letzte Kapitel der Musikgeschichte
Director: Lars Jessen, Jacques Palminger(co-director), Rocko Schamoni(co-director), Sebastian Schultz(co-director), Heinz Strunk(co-director)
Writer: Heinz Strunk (screenplay), Rocko Schamoni (screenplay), Jacques Palminger (screenplay), Sebastian Schultz (screenplay), Lars Jessen (screenplay), Ingo Haeb (screenplay)
Actors: Devid Striesow, Heinz Strunk, Rocko Schamoni, Jacques Palminger
Plot: An inept music manager documents his attempt of bringing about a comeback of the 80s techno pioneers Fraktus, who in the past 30 years have disconnected both from each other and their music.
